alert.note: Alert for Cass (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:59PM CDT until June 15 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FREMONT...WESTERN MILLS...SOUTHWESTERN POTTAWATTAMIE...SARPY...NORTH CENTRAL OTOE...SOUTHEASTERN DOUGLAS AND CASS COUNTIES... At 1159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Plattsmouth, or 7 miles southwest of Offutt AFB, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Southern Omaha, Council Bluffs, Bellevue, Papillion, Ralston, Millard, Offutt AFB, La Vista, Plattsmouth, Glenwood, Springfield, Louisville, Weeping Water, Pacific Junction, Murray, Cedar Creek, Avoca, Union, Nehawka and Aksarben. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
